attributes.action: Act to stop the Deforestation of Indonesia and South America
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Carbon Dioxide is such a threat to the stability of the planet, then why do we increase taxes, when instead we should be preventing the killing of acres of forestry around the world.  These trees absorb CO2 and convert it into O2, therefore if the forests are protected it follows that mans impact on the planet will be reduced.
